alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lower Keys in Monroe County through 1245 PM EDT... At 1209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Geiger Key, or 9 miles southeast of Boca Chica, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Coppitt Key, Boca Chica Channel Bridge, Boca Chica, Saddlebunch Keys, Geiger Key, Bay Point, Shark Key, Upper Sugarloaf Key, Cudjoe Key and Sugarloaf Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 6 and 23. This includes US 1 between mile markers 6 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
